com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.features

Interface DynamicSourceCodeBuilder<T>


  • public interface DynamicSourceCodeBuilder<T>
    Builds "flattened" declarative source code for a given feature, and makes it possible to retrieve the declarative version. If feature.addDynamicSourceCode() returns false, will "dynamise" the feature, that is, recursively replace its arguments with flattened dynamic versions, where an argument is determined as a get/set method pair that refers to a Feature.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String addFeatureVariable(Feature<T,?> feature, String nameBase)
      Adds an argument to the source code and assigns it a value, returning the argument name to be used in the remainder of the source code.
      void addImport(Class<?> importClass)
      Add a class to be imported.
      void append(String string)
      Append a line to the source code.
      Feature<T,?> getFeature()
      Get the dynamic (or dynamised) feature constructed by this builder.
      String getVarName(String base)
      Returns a unique variable name given a base.
      void indent()
      Indent the source code by a tab.
      void outdent()
      Outdent the source code by a tab.
